turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (s) Yeah, I need to order two medium pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what topping would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One of them, I want to have beef, onions, and mushrooms. And the other one, I want to be Italian sausage, pepperoni, and mushrooms. And I want them both to be thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 2 medium pizzas with thin crust, one beef, onion, mushroom, one italian sausage, pepperoni, mushroom, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $38, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I think that sounds right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
